main event: A witness reported seeing a bright, white object in the sky over Belmont, Ohio on November 3, 1965 around 6:40 PM.
interesting points: The object appeared to have several smaller bright lights on the edges.
The object was much brighter than the moon and other stars.
The object just disappeared after a few seconds, without any trail or smoke.
Other witnesses, including Mr. [redacted] and Mrs. [redacted], also saw the object.
The witness failed to mention if the other witnesses had been drinking prior to the sighting.
sighted object: a bright, white object with smaller lights on the edges
witnesses: the report mentions at least 3 witnesses, including the primary witness
photographs: no photographs were included in the report
